programme.title: Lucinda Lambton
programme.short_synopsis: Sue Lawley's castaway is photographer Lucinda Lambton
programme.medium_synopsis: Sue Lawley's castaway is photographer Lucinda Lambton.
programme.long_synopsis:
The castaway in this week's Desert Island Discs is a woman of many passions - passions for places, people and the past. She is photographer Lucinda Lambton, and she'll be sharing her love of the unusual and the beautiful with Sue Lawley.

[Taken from the original programme material for this archive edition of Desert Island Discs] 

Favourite track: Quartet (from Act 2 of Fidelio) by Ludwig van Beethoven
Book: Dictionary of National Biography
Luxury: Word processor
